Class FullProperty

java.lang.Object
Property
FullProperty
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable
public class FullProperty extends Property
Represents a full property in the property management system. Extends the base Property class and includes additional information about property size.

  • Constructor Summary

    • calculatePricePerDay

      public double calculatePricePerDay()
      Calculate the price per day. If the property size is less than 200, the tax will be %1. If the property size is between 200 and 300, the tax will be %3. Else the tax will be %4.
      Specified by:
      calculatePricePerDay in class Property
      Returns:
      The calculated price per day.
